description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in ownCloud Server before 4.0.8 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) readyCallback parameter to apps/files_odfviewer/src/webodf/webodf/flashput/PUT.swf, the (2) root parameter to apps/gallery/templates/index.php, or a (3) malformed query to lib/db.php.
